mapper.select: SELECT a.id, first_lv_discipline_no AS firstLvDisciplineNo, first_lv_discipline_name AS firstLvDisciplineName FROM sys_first_lv_discipline a INNER JOIN sys_user b ON a.user_id = b.id WHERE b.id = #{id}
SELECT b.* FROM sys_first_lv_discipline a INNER JOIN sys_second_lv_discipline b ON a.first_lv_discipline_no = b.belong_first_lv_discipline_no WHERE a.id = #{id}
